TapeQualityInformation.calculate_statisitcs¶

TapeQualityInformation.calculate_statisitcs(p_type: quality_assessment.data_types.TestType, piece_length: Optional[float]) → None[source]¶

Calculates piecewise statistics values.

Parameters

  • p_type (TestType) – Parameter type that should be calculated.

  • piece_length (float, optional) – piece length over which to calculate the parameter. If None, use the whole length.

Previous topic

TapeQualityInformation.calculate_drop_out_info

Next topic

quality_assessment.quality_assessor
